instructions:
Mix olive and sesame oil, then separately mix the dry herbs. Place the tomato slices on a broiler pan and
lightly salt. Drizzle the oil mixture over the tomato slices and sprinkle with the herbs. Broil 3 or 4 inches
from the element for about 3 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle with bread crumbs and continue
broiling for another 1 or 2 minutes. Watch that the bread crumbs do not burn. 
*(Rev. 10/30/92)*
name: Broiled Tomato Slices
